languages.text: Мастерами-тактиками, использующими преимущества отряда, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеры{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}солдаты{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцоры смерти{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.
languages.original_text: Мастерами-тактиками, использующими преимущества отряда, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеры{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}солдаты{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцоры смерти{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Marksmen and Leaders can become Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.
Marksmen and Leaders can become Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.
Soldiers and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.
Soldiers and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziere{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldaten{/g} können zu Meistertaktikern werden – gerissene Mitkämpfer, die das Beste aus den Stärken ihrer Gruppe herausholen.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

traits.locale_text: Scharfschützen und Anführer können zu Taktikern werden, gerissene Mitkämpfer, die das Beste aus den Stärken ihrer Gruppe herausholen.
Soldaten und {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziere{/g} können zu Meistertaktikern werden – gerissene Mitkämpfer, die das Beste aus den Stärken ihrer Gruppe herausholen.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselames{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldats{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officiers{/g} peuvent devenir des maîtres tacticiens, des combattants rusés, capables d'exploiter au mieux les points forts de leur groupe.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

traits.locale_text: Les Tireurs d'Élite et les Leaders peuvent devenir Tacticiens, des combattants rusés capables d'exploiter au mieux les points forts de leur groupe.
Les soldats et les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officiers{/g} peuvent devenir des maîtres tacticiens, des combattants rusés, capables d'exploiter au mieux les points forts de leur groupe.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}士兵{/g}可以晋级为战术专家。战术专家是足智多谋的战斗大师，会充分利用整支队伍的力量攻击敌人。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}士兵{/g}可以晋级为战术专家。战术专家是足智多谋的战斗大师，会充分利用整支队伍的力量攻击敌人。
士兵与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}可以晋级为战术专家。战术专家是足智多谋的战斗大师，会充分利用整支队伍的力量攻击敌人。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}兵士{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は、パーティーの強さを最大限に引き出す巧みな戦闘員である戦略の達人になることができる。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンとリーダーは、パーティーの強さを最大限に引き出す巧みな戦闘員である戦略家になることができる。
兵士と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は、パーティーの強さを最大限に引き出す巧みな戦闘員である戦略の達人になることができる。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hojas danzantes{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficiales{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldados{/g} pueden convertirse en maestros tácticos, combatientes astutos que exprimen las fortalezas de su grupo.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldiers{/g} can become Master Tacticians, cunning combatants who make the most out of their party's strengths.

traits.locale_text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hojas danzantes{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficiales{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldados{/g} pueden convertirse en maestros tácticos, combatientes astutos que exprimen las fortalezas de su grupo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Askerler{/g}; gruplarının güçlü yönlerinden en iyi şekilde yararlanan kurnaz bir muharebe ustası olan Usta Taktisyen'e dönüşebilirler.
